recommendations: Dr.Chhavi Sharma “Radhika is focussed, hard working and ambitious student, who is also best in guiding her classmates and juniors. I have guided her through her course "Financial Accounting" and "Corporate Accounting" during her bachelor's degree at University of Delhi. She always participate in stimulating discussions and ensure that she brings value to the lecture and maintained good academic momentum throughout the course, she is topper of Shivaji College. She is an avid learner and always open to new ideas. In addition to academics, Radhika has reflected her essence in co-curricular activities as well. Her biggest plus is her ability to go extra mile to complete the assigned task with perfection. Radhika, with her resolute confidence assures me that she would be a great asset to institutions that will hire her services.”
